/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence suggesting a soft glow that would light up the street as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. In the distance, the faint outline of mountains can be seen, adding a sense of grandeur to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions by objects. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with trees and street lamps evenly distributed along the length of the street. The mountains in the distance provide a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements.
